write_to_cpptraj_format(self, filename)¶
xyz¶

return a copy of xyz coordinates (ndarray, shape=(n_frames, n_atoms, 3) We can not return a memoryview since Trajectory is a C++ vector of Frame object

pytraj.datasets.cast_dataset module¶

pytraj.datasets.cast_dataset.cast_dataset(dsetin=None, dtype='general')¶

create memoryview for DataSet instance. DataSet instace is taken from DatatSetList Parameters ——— dset : DataSet instance dtype : str (default dtype=None)

{‘general’, ‘matrix’, ‘1D’, ‘2D’, ‘double’,
‘mesh’, ‘matrix_dbl’, ‘matrix_flt’, ‘integer’, ‘coords_crd’, ‘coords’ ‘coords_trj’, ‘trj’}
